function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement social distancing measures and promote regular hand washing and hygiene practices among gardeners.","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage the use of face masks and proper ventilation in garden areas, and limit the number of people in crowded garden spaces.","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide mental health resources, counseling services, and promote community support networks for gardeners.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide clear context and limitations of the study findings","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasize other potential benefits of gardening beyond self-reported health outcomes","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide clear explanation of the specific factors influencing anxiety related to covid-19","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research to explore the potential impact of garden measures on health outcomes","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage a balanced approach to health interventions that includes outdoor activities as well as other health-promoting behaviors","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct research to explore the differential impact of gardening and relaxing in the garden on wellbeing","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide access to private outdoor space, community gardens, or public green spaces","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure equal opportunities to interact with green space, promote community gardens, and provide public green spaces","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage spending time in gardens, promote physical activity programs for older adults, provide age-friendly outdoor spaces","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of gentle exercise and utilization of domestic gardens for maintaining basic physical activity at home.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of spending time in the garden to improve sleep quality and mental well-being.","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict social distancing measures and guidelines for interaction in communal green spaces. promote the use of face masks and hand hygiene.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage outdoor activities and safe exposure to sunlight while following public health guidelines. provide vitamin d supplements where necessary.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of frequently touched surfaces. promotion of outdoor detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct longitudinal studies to track the changes in garden usage and health outcomes over time","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use stratified sampling methods to ensure a balanced representation of different categories","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct sensitivity analyses and consider additional variables in the analysis","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing strict public health measures and vaccination campaigns","category":"Prevent fake
